title: Is ranged vs melee matchups fair in your opinion?
body:
They just seem WAY too hard to win if you're the melee. The ranged has so many advantages such as constant poke. Then again, it's coming from a player who picks melee-only champs with no ranged abilities, but still.

Tips to counter?

replies.body: You put this in the "Team Recruitment" section.  Just fyi.

She was 0/6 before 10 minutes

shhh dont tell no one but {{champion:80}} also counters {{champion:133}} top
your not meant to play melee vs ranged, but if you are fighting a ranged example fiora vs quinn then you play to your strengths and do your best.
{{champion:54}}  top vs range... poke me til 6 ... 6 ult all in kill and won lane for {{champion:54}}
Well duh. that's why there are trade offs for those situations when they do happen.
